<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Underhanded Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=1784) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

</column>

---

You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally. You [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) up to a foe adjacent to one of your allies. You can roll against the foe you're Sneaking up on, even if it's currently [observing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) you, as though you were [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22). You take a –2 penalty on your [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check. If your Stealth check against the chosen foe succeeds, you can make a melee Strike against that foe at the end of your Sneak.
name: Underhanded Assault
